Group_Portfolio_HW_Team_Alpha
Enrique CRUZ Born in January 11, 1994, I was born and raised in Brooklyn NY. My mother and father are devoted parents who have done a lot to raise me and without them I wouldn\'t be where I am at now. I enjoy coding and receiving more knowledge when not in class or at work. In the meantime when I am not studying I enjoy playing video games as well as playing with my kitten who helps relax me. Github Projects https://github.com/ccharle/Group_Portfolio_HW_TEAM_ALPHA
Enrique\'s Portfolio Talha\'s Portfolio Clifford\'s Portfolio Elizabeth\'s Portfolio
GOING TO A NEW PAGE Are you sure you would like to go to an external website?
The goal of this application is to show four Group Alpha members\' biography.
Elizabeth is an Android Developer fellow at Pursuit. Elizabeth was born in Seoul, South Korea, moved to States when she was 14 years old. Elizabeth used to live in Seattle and Los Angeles before she moved to NYC. After spending nearly a decade working in Interior Design, Elizabeth decided to change her career in IT. Elizabeth is passionate about Art, Design, and Travel. Elizabeth\'s hobbies are going to art museums and painting. Cliff is up and coming software developer with attention to detail and user experience, Always learning, and improving. Cliff has invested interest in skateboarding, boxing, video games and to more seamlessly blend tech into everyday modern life, catch me dying at the hospital, a 6ft tall monster. Straight beast. 3 Github projects EY Restaurant Java Bank Android Story App =======
Elizabeth YU
